title: Causes of 20th century global population increase

content.question: Which of the following was the leading cause of the huge global population increase in the twentieth century?

choices.label: Rapid increases in per capita birth rates
The impact of public health measures

content.answer: The impact of public health measures

topic.text: 9.1: Advances in Technology and Exchange after 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
